greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of A335078.
link: Stefano Spezia, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
program: (PARI) TT(n, k) = if (k==0, 1, sumdiv(n, d, TT(d, k-1))); \\ A334996
U(n, m) = sum(k=0, m-1, (-1)^k*binomial(m, k)*TT(n, m-k-1));
T(n, k) = my(p); (1/k)*sumdiv(k, d, if (ispower(n, d, &p), eulerphi(d)*U(p, k/d)));
results.author: _Stefano Spezia_, May 23 2020
